comments:

Reproduced. For the sake of us practicing what we preach, it would have helped 
to add that it only happens if:

1) Classpath containers option is turned on in the preferences
2) PDE editors are left open when closing Eclipse

The dump happens during classpath container initialization. Without classpath 
containers, having opened editors on startup does no cause any problems.
Rearanging the order of model initializations fixed the problem.
